recipe.cookingInstructions: In a large bowl, combine lemongrass, ginger, garlic, vinegar, calamansi juice, brown sugar, fish sauce, salt, and pepper. Marinate chicken for at least 3 hours or overnight. Remove chicken from marinade. Then, grill chicken over medium heat, basting frequently with annatto oil. Lastly, grill until chicken is fully cooked with nice char marks, about 20-25 minutes, turning occasionally.

Blend lemongrass, garlic, ginger, vinegar, soy sauce, brown sugar, chili flakes, and black pepper in a food processor. Then, marinate chicken legs in the mixture for at least 4 hours. Prepare the grill to medium heat, then grill chicken while basting with annatto oil. Lastly, cook until internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C), about 30-35 minutes.

Pound chicken breasts to even thickness. Mix vinegar, lemongrass, garlic, ginger, calamansi juice, brown sugar, turmeric, salt, and pepper to make marinade. Then, marinate chicken for 2-3 hours. Prepare grill to medium-high heat and grill chicken for 5-6 minutes per side, basting with annatto oil. Lastly, ensure chicken is fully cooked but still juicy.

ingredients.ingredient: 5 stalks lemongrass, white parts only, minced

recipe.cookingInstructions: Combine lemongrass, garlic, ginger, vinegar, calamansi juice, brown sugar, fish sauce, salt, and pepper in a large bowl. Add chicken wings and marinate for at least 4 hours. Then, prepare grill to medium heat. Grill wings for 20-25 minutes, turning occasionally and basting with annatto oil. Lastly, serve hot with a side of spiced vinegar.

ingredients.ingredient: 3 tbsp annatto seeds soaked in 1/4 cup oil

recipe.cookingInstructions: Mix lemongrass, vinegar, garlic, ginger, brown sugar, soy sauce, salt, and pepper to create marinade. Marinate chicken necks for 3-4 hours or overnight. Then, thread necks onto skewers if desired. Grill over medium heat for about 15-20 minutes, turning frequently and basting with annatto oil. Lastly, serve with a dipping sauce of vinegar, chili, and garlic.
